item.description:
The AMC Boston Chapter Mountaineering Committee will offer the 2011 Ice Climbing Program this winter.

Similar programs were very popular with some in the group last year - if I am able to participate in this program I would be listing some related events.

The program will begin with two free lectures at the AMC's Cabot Hall (4 Joy Street in Boston, MA) on Wednesday, December 1 and Wednesday, January 5, both from 7:00 PM - 10 PM

Attendance at the first lecture is mandatory if you wish to be admitted to the program. The second lecture is for students accepted to the program and those on the wait list.

Students admitted to the program will then receive two weekends of instruction in the White Mountains. Accommodation and Saturday evening dinner is included in the price of the course. The two program weekends in New Hampshire will take place on January 22 - 23 and February 5 - 6.

The cost of the program is $275 for AMC members and $325 for non-members.

Please contact ice@bostonclimbers.org for questions and more details.
item.name: AMC's Ice Climbing Program (Class #1)
